item.title: Effortless Package Management: A Comprehensive Look at APT
item.description: You must’ve stumbled upon this command while reading online tutorials on how to install software, and we’ve all copy-pasted the command without a second thought because it works well most of the time and is an easy, convenient way to install/update software. Today I’ll dive deeper on the intricacies of this command. What is APT Package Manager The Advanced Package Tool (APT) is a free utility that lets user install, update and manage software packages.
